frame_eqs_str: a['dec_med']=pow(0.9, div(40,a['fps'])); a['dec_slow']=pow(0.99, div(40,a['fps'])); a['beat']=Math.max(Math.max(a['bass_att'], a['mid_att']), a['treb_att']); a['avg']=((a['avg']*a['dec_slow'])+(a['beat']*(1-a['dec_slow']))); a['is_beat']=(above(a['beat'], ((0.2+a['avg'])+a['peak']))*above(a['time'], (a['t0']+0.2))); a['t0']=((a['is_beat']*a['time'])+((1-a['is_beat'])*a['t0'])); a['peak']=((a['is_beat']*a['beat'])+(((1-a['is_beat'])*a['peak'])*a['dec_med'])); a['index']=mod((a['index']+a['is_beat']),18); a['index2']=mod((a['index2']+(a['is_beat']*bnot(a['index']))),5); a['k1']=(a['is_beat']*equal(a['index'], 100)); a['p1']=((a['k1']*(a['p1']+1))+((1-a['k1'])*a['p1'])); a['p2']=((a['dec_med']*a['p2'])+((1-a['dec_med'])*a['p1'])); a['rott']=div((a['p2']*3.14159265359),1); a['q1']=Math.cos(a['rott']); a['q2']=Math.sin(a['rott']); a['q3']=-a['q2']; a['q4']=a['q1']; a['q27']=(8-a['index']); a['q28']=(Math.sin(div(a['time'],3))+Math.sin(div(a['time'],5))); a['q5']=Math.sin((a['treb_att']*0.5)); a['q6']=Math.cos(div(a['time'],7)); a['rot']=sqrt(Math.sin((2-(a['treb_att']*0.055)))); a['warp']=Math.cos((a['mid_att']*0.5)); a['gamma']=div(a['gamma'],(a['treb_att']+a['mid_att'])); a['decay']=(a['decay']-(a['treb_att']*0.5)); a['mv_a']=(0.5-(a['treb_att']*0.9)); a['mv_g']=Math.sin(a['mid_att']); a['darken'] a['mv_l']=(1+(a['treb_att']*0.055)); a['zoom']=(a['zoom']+(a['treb_att']*0.105));
